page.title: 03My Sunday
page.content: Every Sunday I get up at nine O'clock for breakfast. I then read until it is time to get dressed for Wellington Street Sunday School which starts at quarter past ten. At half past eleven I go to church. The church service finishes at ten to one. When it is over I go home and have dinner. Afterwards I usually help with the dishes. I go to sleep at two o'clock and wake at three o'clock. Then I go to Ballee Mission Hall Sunday School. There we learn verses and receive prizes for reciting them. When I get home I have tea and play until it is time to go to evening service at Ballee Mission Hall. At nine o'clock I return home, have supper, get changed and go to bed.
